keyword.name: arrayfun
keyword.description: Apply a function to each element of an array.

keyword.name: cell
keyword.description: Create cell array of empty matrices.

keyword.name: cell2mat
keyword.description: Transform a cell array containing matrices into a single, concatenated matrix.

keyword.name: cell2struct
keyword.description: Creates a struct from a cell.

keyword.name: cellfun
keyword.description: Evaluates an function on a cell.

keyword.name: cellstr
keyword.description: Converts to cell of character array.

keyword.name: fieldnames
keyword.description: Returns field names of a structure or an handle.

keyword.name: getfield
keyword.description: Returns value of a field in a struct.

keyword.name: iscellstr
keyword.description: Returns if a variable is a cell of strings.

keyword.name: isfield
keyword.description: Checks if a fieldname exists in a struct.

keyword.name: namedargs2cell
keyword.description: Converts a struct containing name-value pairs to a cell.

keyword.name: num2cell
keyword.description: Convert array to cell array with consistently sized cells.

keyword.name: orderfields
keyword.description: Reorganize the fields of a structured array.

keyword.name: renameStructField
keyword.description: Rename field names of a struct or struct array.

keyword.name: struct2cell
keyword.description: Creates a cell from a structure.
